duties_responsibilities.duty: Resolve integration and production issues with varying systems, including Fuel, Self-Checkout, and POS services.
Work with business associates and vendors to plan and implement changes to retail platforms.
Serve as a technical resource to other projects involving retail systems.
Ensure seamless equipment integration and perform technical evaluations of new vendor hardware and software products.
Participate in on-call rotations for after-hours store support.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology or an equivalent combination of education and experience.
